mapper.select: select apply_id, organize_unit, organize_name, staff_id, apply_time, apply_reason, receive_name, receive_phone, receive_address, cost_money, current_state, is_finished, comment from asset_apply_info where apply_id = #{applyId}
mapper.insert: insert into asset_apply_info(apply_id, organize_unit, organize_name, staff_id, apply_time, apply_reason, receive_name, receive_phone, receive_address, cost_money, current_state, is_finished, comment) values (#{applyId}, #{organizeUnit}, #{organizeName}, #{staffId}, #{applyTime}, #{applyReason}, #{receiveName}, #{receivePhone}, #{receiveAddress}, #{costMoney}, #{currentState}, #{isFinished}, #{comment})

insert into asset_apply_info(organize_unit, organize_name, staff_id, apply_time, apply_reason, receive_name, receive_phone, receive_address, cost_money, current_state, is_finished, comment) values
(#{entity.organizeUnit}, #{entity.organizeName}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.applyTime}, #{entity.applyReason}, #{entity.receiveName}, #{entity.receivePhone}, #{entity.receiveAddress}, #{entity.costMoney}, #{entity.currentState}, #{entity.isFinished}, #{entity.comment})

insert into asset_apply_info(organize_unit, organize_name, staff_id, apply_time, apply_reason, receive_name, receive_phone, receive_address, cost_money, current_state, is_finished, comment) values
(#{entity.organizeUnit}, #{entity.organizeName}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.applyTime}, #{entity.applyReason}, #{entity.receiveName}, #{entity.receivePhone}, #{entity.receiveAddress}, #{entity.costMoney}, #{entity.currentState}, #{entity.isFinished}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update organize_unit = values(organize_unit), organize_name = values(organize_name), staff_id = values(staff_id), apply_time = values(apply_time), apply_reason = values(apply_reason), receive_name = values(receive_name), receive_phone = values(receive_phone), receive_address = values(receive_address), cost_money = values(cost_money), current_state = values(current_state), is_finished = values(is_finished), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update asset_apply_info
organize_unit = #{organizeUnit},
organize_name = #{organizeName},
staff_id = #{staffId},
apply_time = #{applyTime},
apply_reason = #{applyReason},
receive_name = #{receiveName},
receive_phone = #{receivePhone},
receive_address = #{receiveAddress},
cost_money = #{costMoney},
current_state = #{currentState},
is_finished = #{isFinished},
comment = #{comment},
where apply_id = #{applyId}
